TableField.name: CourseID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track training courses available to the organization

TableField.name: CourseCode
TableField.phrase: Course Code|A unique code used to identify a course offering. A course code can include numbers, letters and special characters; such as, dashes and periods

TableField.name: CourseTitle
TableField.phrase: Title|A brief name used to identify the course offering
TableField.sample: Introduction to Hazard Analysis of Critical Control Points (HACCP)

TableField.name: CourseDesc
TableField.phrase: Description|A detailed description of the course
TableField.sample: The Introduction to Hazard Analysis of Critical Control Points (HACCP) course provides attendees with a working knowledge of company and regulatory product quality requirements. The course also provides attendees with a working knowledge of the company's internal policies and controls deployed to protect consumers from product quality deficiencies.

TableField.name: CourseObj
TableField.phrase: Objective|A detailed description of the course objective. The course objective should reflect the knowledge expected of attendees as they complete the course
TableField.sample: The objective of the Introduction to HACCP course is to provide attendees with the level of understanding required to perform operational duties within a HACCP environment. This course is designed to provide visitors to a HACCP environment with the requisite level of understanding to avoid product contamination behaviors during visitations.

TableField.name: TrainingTypeID
TableField.phrase: Training Type|A combined field used to describe this training type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: TrainingCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Training Category|A word or short phrase used to describe the category of training

CodeField.name: TrainingCategory
CodeField.phrase: Training Category|A word or short phrase used to describe the category of training

ForeignField.name: TrainingTypeDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Training Type Description|A detailed description of the training type
ForeignField.sample: On the job health and safety training should utilize the exact same types of equipment used by an employee during the performance of the job duties being trained.

ForeignField.name: TrainingType
ForeignField.phrase: Training Type|A combined field used to describe this training type when associating it with other records
ForeignField.sample: On the Job | Health and Safety

TableField.name: OrgLevelID
TableField.phrase: Organization Level|The hierarchical level of the organization

CodeField.name: OrgLevel
CodeField.phrase: Organization Level|The hierarchical level of the organization

TableField.name: MinClassSize
TableField.phrase: Minimum Class Size|The minimum number of attendees required for a class to be conducted

TableField.name: MaxClassSize
TableField.phrase: Maximum Class Size|The maximum number of attendees allowed for this course

TableField.name: Duration
TableField.phrase: Duration|The number of hours required to conduct the course

TableField.name: TimeUnitID
TableField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: TimeUnitCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

CodeField.name: TimeUnitCategory
CodeField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

ForeignField.name: TimeUnit
ForeignField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

TableField.name: Validity
TableField.phrase: Validity Period|The amount of time that may pass before the training course satisfaction is no longer valid

TableField.name: ValidityUnitID
TableField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: ValidityUnitCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

CodeField.name: ValidityUnitCategory
CodeField.phrase: Unit Category|A broadly defined title or phrase used to group unit types

ForeignField.name: ValidityUnit
ForeignField.phrase: Unit|A combined field used to describe this unit when associating it with other records

TableField.name: CoursePrep
TableField.phrase: Preparation|A detailed description of the preparation required by attendees of the course in advance of class attendance

TableField.name: OrganizationID
TableField.phrase: Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for the design, development, and support for this course throughout the enterprise

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The organization with primary responsibility for the design, development, and support for this course throughout the enterprise

RemoteField.name: PersonAccountableID
RemoteField.phrase: Person Accountable|The person responsible for maintaining course content currency and quality

ForeignField.name: PersonAccountable
ForeignField.phrase: Person Accountable|The person responsible for maintaining course content currency and quality

TableField.name: RegulatoryRequired
TableField.phrase: Regulatory Required|Whether this training course is required to satisfy a regulatory requirement

TableField.name: CourseStatusID
TableField.phrase: Status|Status of the course curriculum and level of completion

CodeField.name: CourseStatus
CodeField.phrase: Status|Status of the course curriculum and level of completion

SummaryField.name: RiskImperatives
SummaryField.phrase: Risk Imperatives|A list of associated Risk Imperatives

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: CourseDuration
CombinedField.phrase: Course Duration|The duration of the course when presented

CombinedField.name: ValidityPeriod
CombinedField.phrase: Validity Period|The amount of time that may pass before the training course satisfaction is no longer valid

CombinedField.name: Course
CombinedField.phrase: Course|A combined field used to describe this course when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: Introduction to Hazard Analysis of Critical Control Points (HACCP); Leadership; QA-HACCP-101.1

CodeCheckSearchField.name: RiskImperativeID
CodeCheckSearchField.phrase: Risk Imperatives|Filter search results by one or more related risk imperatives

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: People Elements
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific information regarding the way this module impacts people should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about how this module impacts, or is impacted by, people in general. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
